mapper.update: update attendance set off_time = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI:SS') where member_id = #{member_id} and TO_CHAR(attend_date)= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select count(*) from attendance where member_id = #{member_id} and TO_CHAR(attend_date) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)
select commute_time As commute, off_time As off From attendance where member_id = #{member_id} and TO_CHAR(attend_date) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE)

Select TO_CHAR(attend_date,'day') AS week,COMMUTE_TIME AS commute,OFF_TIME AS off from attendance where ATTEND_DATE between TRUNC(sysdate-#{ago},'iw') and TRUNC(sysdate-#{ago},'iw')+6 and member_id = #{member_id} order by attend_date
